decks.notes: The main focus of this Gruul Aggro deck is on efficiently dealing damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. This is achieved through a combination of aggressive creatures like Heartfire Hero and Emberheart Challenger, along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage. The deck also includes ways to generate additional resources with cards like Innkeeper's Talent and Monstrous Rage. By applying constant pressure and utilizing a mix of creatures and direct damage spells, the deck aims to close out games swiftly and decisively.

This deck focuses on utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation to tutor for powerful creatures and enchantments while controlling the opponent's board with removal spells like Vanishing Verse and Fatal Push. The deck includes a diverse range of creatures and enchantments to adapt to various situations, with the ability to generate card advantage and establish a dominant board presence. The inclusion of Zur, Eternal Schemer and Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and flexibility in the deck's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to out-value and out-maneuver opponents through efficient resource management and strategic decision-making.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of removal spells, card draw, and powerful creatures. By utilizing cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Ill-Timed Explosion to control the board, along with Fires of Victory to maintain tempo, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and flexibility in managing threats. With a strong mix of control elements and card advantage, this deck aims to establish dominance over the opponent in a longer game.
